metadata.description: Curated AI agent plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: change-journal
plugins.description: Automatically track file changes across agent sessions for cross-workspace awareness. Provides a queryable journal of what changed, when, where, and by whom.

plugins.name: clip
plugins.description: Copy clean text to clipboard without terminal formatting artifacts. Supports code blocks, text, commands, full responses, and plans.

plugins.name: deslop
plugins.description: Detect and remove AI-generated code patterns (slop) from your branch. Catches unnecessary comments, over-engineering, defensive coding, and style inconsistencies.

plugins.name: grepika
plugins.description: Token-efficient codebase exploration using grepika MCP server with trigram indexing, FTS5 search, and semantic file discovery.

plugins.name: humanika
plugins.description: Detect and fix AI writing patterns to make text sound like it was written by a real person with opinions, personality, and specific knowledge.

plugins.name: jj
plugins.description: JJ (Jujutsu) version control workflows for AI agentic development with Git colocation, parallel workspaces, and conflict resolution.

plugins.name: notify
plugins.description: macOS desktop notifications for Claude Code lifecycle events. Get notified when Claude needs input or completes a task.

plugins.name: personas
plugins.description: Engineering persona commands for specialized domain expertise. Activate backend, frontend, fullstack, infra, or observability personas.

plugins.name: prompt-engineering
plugins.description: Socratic reasoning for deep analysis and automatic task completion verification.
